eu.h2020.helios_social.modules.socialgraphmining.diffusion

Class PPRMiner

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.h2020.helios_social.modules.socialgraphmining.SocialGraphMiner
      • eu.h2020.helios_social.modules.socialgraphmining.diffusion.PPRMiner

  • public class PPRMiner
extends SocialGraphMiner
    This class implements a Personalized PageRank scheme, where each ego node's personalization is a vector (modeled by a JGNN library Tensor) passed to the constructor and which is smoothed over the decentralized social graph. Smoothing outcome for contexts is obtained through the method getSmoothedPersonalization(Context).
    Author:
    Emmanouil Krasanakis

      • getRestartProbability

        public double getRestartProbability()
        Retrieves the restart probability of the equivalent random walk with restart scheme associated with personalized PageRank.
        Returns:
        The restart probability.
        See Also:
        setRestartProbability(double)

      • setPersonalizationAsGroundTruth

        public PPRMiner setPersonalizationAsGroundTruth(boolean personalizationAsGroundTruth)
        Sets whether personalization should be considered as ground truth. If this is true and the personalization vector has a non-zero norm (i.e. has at least one non-zero element), then the outcome of #getSmoothedPersonalization() is forcefully snapped to the personalization vector. Making this depend on the norm helps deployment of models.
        Parameters:
        personalizationAsGroundTruth - A boolean value on whether personalization should be considered ground truth.
        Returns:
        this miner's instance.

      • setRestartProbability

        public PPRMiner setRestartProbability(double restartProbability)
        Sets the restart probability of the personalized PageRank scheme. Smaller values induce broader diffusion of predictions, i.e. many hops away in the social graph. The equivalent random walk with restart scheme has average random walk length equal to 1/(restart probability).
        Suggested values to experiment with:
        - 0.15 (used in older personalized PageRank papers)
        - 0.10 (default, used by graph neural networks to great success)
        - 0.01 (extremely long walks, suitable to detect communities of high radius from few examples)
        Parameters:
        restartProbability - The restart probability in the range (0,1) (default is 0.1).
        Returns:
        this miner's instance.

      • updatePersonalization

        public PPRMiner updatePersonalization(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Context context,
                                      mklab.JGNN.core.Tensor personalization)
        Copies the elements of a given vector to the ego's personalization vector in the provided context.
        Parameters:
        context - The context in which to set the new personalization vector.
        personalization - The tensor to set as new personalization vector.
        Returns:
        this miner's instance.
        See Also:
        updatePersonalization(Tensor)

      • updatePersonalization

        public PPRMiner updatePersonalization(mklab.JGNN.core.Tensor personalization)
        Wraps the method updatePersonalization(Context, Tensor) to update all contexts with the given personalization. The given personalization is also automatically initialized for future context generations.
        Parameters:
        personalization - The tensor to set as new personalization vector in all contexts.
        Returns:
        this miner's instance.

      • getPersonalization

        public mklab.JGNN.core.Tensor getPersonalization(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Context context)
        Retrieves the ego node's personalization set for the specific context. Changing the output tensor is equivalent to changing the personalization.
        Returns:
        The personalization vector.

      • getSmoothedPersonalization

        public mklab.JGNN.core.Tensor getSmoothedPersonalization(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Context context)
        Retrieves the outcome of smoothing the outcome of the ego's personalization through the social graph. Changing the output tensor temporarilly affects the personalization.
        Returns:
        A Tensor holding a smoothing of the personalization.

      • getNormalizedSmoothedPersonalization

        public mklab.JGNN.core.Tensor getNormalizedSmoothedPersonalization(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Context context)
        Retrieves the outcome of #getSmoothedPersonalization() and postprocesses it so that its minimum value is zero and its elements sum to 1.
        Returns:
        A Tensor holding a normalized version of the smoothed personalization.

      • constructModelParameterObject

        public SocialGraphMiner.SocialGraphMinerParameters constructModelParameterObject(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Interaction interaction)
        Description copied from class: SocialGraphMiner
        Retrieves the parameters of the mining model that will be sent alongside the created interaction. This method is wrapped by SocialGraphMiner.getModelParameters(Interaction) to potentially not construct parameters at all, if SocialGraphMiner.setSendPermision(boolean).
        Parameters:
        interaction - The new interaction the user receives expressed in terms of the contextual ego network
        Returns:
        A SocialGraphMiner.SocialGraphMinerParameters object of miner parameters.

      • predictNewInteraction

        public double predictNewInteraction(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Context context,
                                    eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Node destinationNode)
        Description copied from class: SocialGraphMiner
        Predicts the weight of performing a SEND interaction between the given context's ego and a destination node within a given context. This method should typically return values in the [0,1] range, where higher values correspond to more likely interactions.
        Specified by:
        predictNewInteraction in class SocialGraphMiner
        Parameters:
        context - The context in which to perform the prediction.
        destinationNode - The destination node of the interaction.
        Returns:
        The weight of performing the interaction (higher values are more likely).
